title: ‘What’s our fault?’: India’s expulsion of Pakistanis still splits families
description: After Pahalgam attack in April, India deported 800 Pakistanis. Children separated from parents still can't meet them.
content: Srinagar, Indian-administered Kashmir The silence of a narrow alley in Srinagar, the main city of Indian-administered Kashmir, is broken by the rehearsed beckoning of street vendors and the restless … [+14522 chars]
